page.title: 12The Roseland School, Tregony
page.content: Roseland School is a comprehensive situated just outside the village of Tregony.Roseland School became a comprehensive in 1976.It has 480 pupils who come to school by bus,and 31 teachers including the headmaster who also teaches.There are 5 years and four classes in each year up to the third year.From the fourth to the fifth year there are seven or eight classes.There are 24 pupils in each class in the first,second and the third years,and twenty in the fourth and fifth years. The school has a tarmac playground surrounded by playing fields.It also has a hall with a stage ,a swimming pool,a computer room,art rooms,metalwork and woodwork workshops and science laboratories. {Continued on next page. }
